short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prepends 'Convicted Felon' to 'Donald Trump' in webpage text, for accuracy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
On 2025-05-30, former U.S. President Donald Trump was unanimously convicted of 34 felonies in the state of New York by a jury of his peers. 

The jury deliberated for 9 hours total. He was given due process, had a chance to reject any jurors, agreed to the jurors, was given the choice to testify and declined, and expressly declined a "right to counsel" defense. It was a fair and just trial.

This chrome extension modifies the text in any web page to accurately reflect Donald's convicted felon status, for purposes of historical accuracy.
